from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

1cb7ebbc-5018-47ae-b24e-57359aa8ade4.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
1cb7ebbc-5018-47ae-b24e-57359aa8ade4.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

e9faf1ca-c2c6-4d2d-943a-5b6e7b6eec25.name: Directional
e9faf1ca-c2c6-4d2d-943a-5b6e7b6eec25.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

322f1da5-5253-4875-a479-85256bf88134.name: Tough Skin
322f1da5-5253-4875-a479-85256bf88134.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

79c93a9b-61e9-4c05-ac5a-f516cafe2e9e.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

3bd1886e-3590-4581-97cc-70c6bb844884.name: Oxygen Storage
3bd1886e-3590-4581-97cc-70c6bb844884.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

6761df8a-3e95-433d-aa95-b29288d64f54.name: Oxygen Storage
6761df8a-3e95-433d-aa95-b29288d64f54.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

7473973c-cd1a-4ebe-a773-ec0e9afc8b0d.name: Oxygen Storage
7473973c-cd1a-4ebe-a773-ec0e9afc8b0d.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

0a3a404c-1b63-41c9-8bd3-78c57365d50b.name: Oxygen Storage
0a3a404c-1b63-41c9-8bd3-78c57365d50b.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

e71e2857-95fe-45fc-bae7-5089b476eeb8.name: Oxygen Storage
e71e2857-95fe-45fc-bae7-5089b476eeb8.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

5ed2a101-55dc-4902-a275-28bd145f7402.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

bccc5645-81bb-40ec-9760-9d22ee5e384d.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

6b96fae5-bce3-4c5f-8143-18d49fdc600a.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

2a770cca-daac-424d-ae6b-e4e16dedfc9e.name: Indomitable
2a770cca-daac-424d-ae6b-e4e16dedfc9e.notes: Impossible to influence through ordinary words or actions

b6fbd107-9a91-43e8-83d8-f781eaeefa3f.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

e7d8ee7a-4f02-46d7-ba90-ce48b4731e27.name: Diffuse
e7d8ee7a-4f02-46d7-ba90-ce48b4731e27.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

90bb4d76-b629-4ccf-b0eb-7d739b77107b.name: Homogenous
90bb4d76-b629-4ccf-b0eb-7d739b77107b.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

b9736682-6445-47db-a92d-11830b5d4443.name: No Blood
b9736682-6445-47db-a92d-11830b5d4443.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

4122f3e9-ed0e-4b42-a24d-e14a11c984e2.name: No Brain
4122f3e9-ed0e-4b42-a24d-e14a11c984e2.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

4056f66e-a8f3-443c-b1e9-32de4a34e070.name: No Eyes
4056f66e-a8f3-443c-b1e9-32de4a34e070.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

5319d222-7bcb-4b82-bdce-5e1b7e31a52e.name: No Head
5319d222-7bcb-4b82-bdce-5e1b7e31a52e.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

b5e3b439-369d-4f45-b8d8-d201b23cebe2.name: No Neck
b5e3b439-369d-4f45-b8d8-d201b23cebe2.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

f259deae-20a8-4585-aa42-0dacf9aefa08.name: No Vitals
f259deae-20a8-4585-aa42-0dacf9aefa08.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

554b73a8-3865-4c01-a54c-ee5281e6da67.name: Unliving
554b73a8-3865-4c01-a54c-ee5281e6da67.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

f42723de-8f48-408f-abe4-5fcfb44b155b.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

3c29fbbe-5ea7-4808-a772-56dca2bbe775.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

c92c9439-aba6-48e0-9854-e7fbc3b2f172.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

69dade06-7023-43c3-b7cd-056f1c60ab9a.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

7aa8063a-13cb-40df-a7a5-5f09ce8f63ba.name: Single-Minded
7aa8063a-13cb-40df-a7a5-5f09ce8f63ba.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

94d5be39-5870-4e5d-b8a4-74eadcd35d3a.name: Unfazeable
94d5be39-5870-4e5d-b8a4-74eadcd35d3a.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

f8e5199f-7b4a-4ef8-9485-e246da4f86cc.name: Hidebound
f8e5199f-7b4a-4ef8-9485-e246da4f86cc.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.

66d8d311-19e7-454e-9370-c6d9dee69a06.name: Incurious
66d8d311-19e7-454e-9370-c6d9dee69a06.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

5e7a8939-aa95-4a62-8ec5-4126eb4edd89.name: Bad Grip
5e7a8939-aa95-4a62-8ec5-4126eb4edd89.notes: -2/level to tasks that require a firm grip (max 3 levels)
